title: Future Opportunity - Director, Public Relations (Cashmere)
content:
***We are growing and anticipating an exciting new opportunity to open on our teams in the near future. We look forward to considering your submission at that time and will reach out as soon as we are able to move forward.***
We're seeking an experienced, collaborative, and self-motivated Director whose career has an emphasis in PR and Entertainment to work daily with clients, and in conjunction with specialized internal teams.  The ideal candidate will be an extended leadership member of the team who is ambitious, results-oriented, curious and willing to contribute to the overall agency's success. The candidate will have a proven management track record with developing star performers and building strong teams. This candidate loves and is passionate about all elements within Culture and entertainment - film, tv, original content, music, talent, Awards and more.
An ideal candidate will be a solution-oriented professional who is able to oversee and drive multiple campaigns at one time and effectively communicate to clients, stakeholders and team members. 
The PR Director will be instrumental in contributing to the agency’s Corporate Communications strategy and new business initiatives. The candidate will be responsible for helping to create and execute innovative PR programs to create innovative real media results. This candidate also has deep media relationships with National, Culture, multicultural, Hispanic, and industry press and understands how to create positioning, stories and narratives for clients. 
Key Responsibilities

Proven ability to problem-solve and pivot in a fast paced environment
Experience with building trusted and fruitful client relations; which includes leading strategy, brainstorms, and critical thinking
Proven leadership and management skills 
Maintaining positive and growing client relationships
Business development abilities with a track record of success 
Determine KPI goals for all client campaigns and create strategies 
Organized and able to guide the team to work efficiently across accounts
Desire to grow team members professionally and develop key team members 
Work with senior leaders and account leads on budgets and team resources
Experienced at winning new clients, developing new business pitches and pitching prospective clients 
Business acumen with the ability to communicate across departments and represent PR at a Leadership level
Create and execute strategic PR campaigns targeting audiences that affect drive and positively affect culture
Utilize trends in PR, marketing and culture to impact traditional PR and multi-faceted campaigns
Work closely with the social media and marketing teams to develop and execute cross-functional campaign strategy
Secure media results for clients on a daily basis
Proven track record of traditional and social publicity results on behalf of clients
Ability to lead team and client initiatives and identify potential issues and troubleshoot
Work with executive/leadership staff on identifying new business opportunities for the agency
Secure media and conference/speaking opportunities for the agency as part of the Corporate Communications initiative
Cultivate media and partnership relationships with national, lifestyle, consumer, Culture and multicultural press

Requirements:

Minimum 10 years progressive Public Relations experience
Minimum of 5 years managing and mentoring junior team members 
Strong understanding of culture-changing trends and media 
Detail-oriented, highly organized and the ability to easily multi-task in a fast-paced environment
Has strong top tier media relationship and ability to build positive and engaging relationships with media (print, broadcast, online, blogs, consumer, mainstream, culture, multicultural and trade press)  
Client-focused, with strong client relations skills 
Exceptional written, verbal and presentation skills 
Extensive knowledge of current trends, lifestyle brands, digital and industry influencers to incorporate into media strategies
Social media savvy with an understanding of emerging platforms and technology      
Forward-thinker, who is constantly looking for new ways to promote and enhance client campaigns    
Strong team player and also an independent thinker who can take initiative on their own  
A diverse roster of previous PR client work, touching on the areas of lifestyle, consumer, corporate communications
Strong knowledge of the PR field including experience in media relations, press campaign development, and execution of creative and strategic communication plans.  
Existing relationships with media, including both traditional and non-traditional outlets, including niche blogs and influencers
Excellent networking ability
Must understand digital and new media platforms and how to translate knowledge into creating transmedia campaigns for all clients
Ability to work under pressure in time-sensitive environments on multiple clients accounts simultaneously
Strong proficiency Google Suite (Calendar, Sheets, Slides, Gmail) 

 
#LI-KW1About Media.Monks:
Media.Monks is the purely digital operating brand of S4Capital plc that connects 8,600+ digital natives across one global team. We are united by a mission to shift industries forward and pave the path towards ambitious outcomes so our clients and our people can realize their full potential for growth. Our unified model combines solutions in media, data, social, platforms, studio, experience, brand and technology services to help our clients continuously reinvent themselves throughout increasingly rapid cycles of disruption. Our efforts to shape culture, build innovative technologies and unlock the future of growth have earned recognition from numerous esteemed panels: we maintain a constant presence on Adweek’s Fastest Growing lists (2019-22), regular recognition at Cannes Lions, inclusion in AdExchanger’s Programmatic Power Players (2020-23), the title of Webby Production Company of the Year (2021-23), a record number of FWAs, and have earned a spot on Newsweek’s Top 100 Global Most Loved Workplaces 2023. Together, these achievements solidify our experience in digital innovation, excellence in craft, and commitment to personal growth.
While we continue to grow our teams, please be mindful of fraudulent job postings and recruiting activities that may use our company name and information. Please be mindful to protect your personal information, especially your national identification number, and bank account information during a recruiting process. While Media.Monks may reach out to potential candidates via LinkedIn, we will always ask applicants to apply through our website (https://media.monks.com/careers) and will never ask for payment or bank account information during the recruitment process.

Responsible for resourcing and implementing security controls for your teams processes and systems


Responsible that all your personnel apply information security in accordance with the established information security policy
